ProjectTitle: Molecular mechanism of insect pentameric ligand-gated ion channels as a target for new insecticides
InitialFeedbackHistory: 03/04/2024 [REDACTED] please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and share those? [REDACTED] you mention RDR to preserve but not to share data; note that RDR is not intended to just preserve data without sharing, see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr. PDB which you describe under sharing will preserve your data as well so you can add this under preservation. [REDACTED] publishing in PDB, [REDACTED] or other repositories don't forget to register the metadata in LIRIAS so it will appear on your publication list (for RDR this is done automatically) see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/output/lirias/register-datasets-in-lirias
label: good with suggestions
